monster.name: Nex_athar
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Aether Absorption
entries: Nex_athar absorbs magical energy from the surroundings. Whenever a spell is cast within 60 feet of Nex_athar, he gains a +2 bonus to AC and saving throws until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: Nex_athar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, mage hand, prestidigitation
1/day each: plane shift, power word kill

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nex_athar makes two attacks with his Hellfire Claws or uses his Devour Magic twice.

action.name: Hellfire Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}44 (8d8 + 10) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) fire damage.

action.name: Devour Magic
entries: Nex_athar targets one creature or magical effect within 60 feet. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or have one of its spells (of 3rd level or lower) that it has cast and is currently maintaining through concentration stolen by Nex_athar. If the target is a magical effect, Nex_athar attempts to end it as if casting dispel magic at 5th level.

legendaryHeader: Nex_athar can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Nex_athar regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 1)
entries: Nex_athar makes one attack with his Hellfire Claws.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2)
entries: Nex_athar casts a spell from his list of Innate Spellcasting, using up the same amount of uses as if he had cast it normally.

legendary.name: Aether Surge (Costs 3)
entries: Nex_athar releases a wave of absorbed magical energy. Each creature within 30 feet of him must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Nex_athar is an ancient devil born from the absence of Aether, the magical force pervasive in the world. He appears as a towering figure shrouded in shadows, with eyes that burn like the coals of a dying fire. His presence is enough to drain the magic from the air, making him a feared opponent for any magic user.
